item.description:
I'm reposting this from Steve Williams (event host), graphic designer, and co-organizer (with me) of Design Venturers Western Mass. Come join us. RSVPing at the DVWM event page will be helpful :)

http://www.meetup.com/Design-Venturers-Western-Mass/events/109655902/

Let's get to know each other over some food and beverages. I would love to discuss the work we are all doing, how we would like to help each other develop in our chosen fields, and what other topics/projects could be explored at later meetups. Possible areas of interest: typography, animation, graphic novels, skill share, collaborative work.

Â 

See you there !
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a big guy with unruly hair. You'll know me (Steve Williams) when you see me.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western MA Graphic Designers: Meet, greet and general discussion
